nodes.text: From the first moment we met, I have always known you were special. You look so lovely with the firelight dancing in your eyes that I can't help being enchanted by you.
I wanted this chance to tell you all things I love about you - your wild spirit, your passion, your determination to succeed...
This is my way of showing you just how much I care for you.
You are special to me, too, Shawn.
Maybe you should do less telling and more showing then.

I'm only a Disbarred Bard, so words are hard,
But I can't conceal the way I feel
And so, I want to show,
My love sincere, my dear.
So you do love, maybe a little?

options.text: Say You Love Esme a Lot

nodes.text: I love you more than my words can say.
Is good to know.

options.text: Say You Love Esme a Little

nodes.text: Maybe so. Just a little.
Some Rogue I'd be if I admitted that you stole my heart...

options.text: Say You Want to be Esme's Friend

nodes.text: I want to be the best friend you ever had, Esme. Let's have some fun together, why don't we?
Well, we didn't exactly come here to plot to take over the world or to critique the artwork.
What say we start with a little snuggling, move to some cuddling, then a few kisses, and finish with some frenetic canoodling?
You're welcome to bite me if I go too far... or if you want me to go farther.
Vell, how romantic can you get? Okay, let's try out the snuggling part first.
And how are you any different from Sosi? He vanted to canoodle, too.
Well, other than the fact he's taller, has dark hair, and a ponytail, we're exactly alike... Other than the part where he's a total jerk and I'm not.
Oh, and there's the fact that, unlike Sosi, I know beforehand that if I go too far, you really will tear out my throat.
Vell, then let's start vith the snuggling part then.
I had hoped you could teach me some of those fancy card tricks you know...
Or we could just enjoy one another's company as we watch the fire dance. What would you like to do?
Maybe ve could do a little snuggling, too.

options.text: Tell Esme How Much You Love Her

nodes.text: Esme, the truth is that I am so in love with you that I can't hide it anymore! I can't wait to run my fingers through your hair as I whisper lovingly in your ear while we snuggle close together...
You are so romantic!
So could we get to the kissing part already?
<kiss> This is more what I had in mind...
I like the vay you think...
You are just like Sosi!
The difference between Sosi and me is that he misses his kisses and I kisses the misses.
Plus, I'm cuter, cleverer, and much more fun to be with. So shall I show you a good time or not?
Well, as long as ve are both having fun...
I vant you to know how much I love you, Shawn. I am happy ve are together. It makes my heart varm.
I'm so glad we finally got a chance to be together like this.
You know I love you, too. I'll always love you.
<kiss>
So we can get back to the canoodling part now?
Esme, I love you, too. I'm happy everytime you smile. You are the best thing in my life.
<kiss>
Mmmmm... could I get a few more of those, please?

options.text: Tell Esme How Sweet She Is

nodes.text: Esme, you are so sweet. Your lips are like the taste of honey. May I have another kiss, pretty please?
You are funny guy, Shawn. Is fun to canoodle vith you.
There's a lot more canoodling we could do.
<laugh> Ve could... but is very late. I am getting sleepy.
We could just snuggle a little more...
Ve both need to sleep before class in morning. I do not vish the Master to catch me dozing off. I do not vant to annoy the Master.
Maybe just one more teensy-tiny kiss please?
Okay, just one more... <kiss>
Now ve must sneak back to our rooms.
I'll sneak with you anywhere.
But don't be surprised if I try to steal a kiss or two along the way... I am a Rogue, after all.
